UniprotID	Q5VWZ2-2
Accession	Q5VWZ2;A8K677;Q5VWZ3;Q7Z4A3;Q96AV0
EntryName	LYPL1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Lysophospholipase-like protein 1 (EC 3.1.2.22)
GeneName	LYPLAL1
Length	221
Function	Palmitoyl thioesterase that catalyzes depalmitoylation of CGAS and KCNMA1 (PubMed:22052940, PubMed:22399288, PubMed:37802025). Acts as a regulator of innate immunity by mediating depalmitoylation of CGAS, thereby preventing CGAS homodimerization and cyclic GMP-AMP synthase activity (PubMed:37802025). Does not exhibit phospholipase nor triacylglycerol lipase activity, able to hydrolyze only short chain substrates due to its shallow active site (PubMed:22052940).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol; Cytoplasm; Cytosol
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy	
Polar	
Charge
